html.body: $ TODO % Future plans * save changes back to database $ 3.3.6 % Verze 3.3.6 _ 2014-03-27 * fixed crash while loading empty cache $ 3.3.5 % Verze 3.3.5 _ 2014-03-26 * removed repetitive loading waypoints * show information that no cache matches user filter * bug fixes $ 3.3.4 % Verze 3.3.4 _ 2014-03-24 * optimalization during loading/import $ 3.3.3 % Version 3.3.3 _ 2014-03-17 * new "What's new" dialog :-) $ 3.3.2 % Version 3.3.2 _ 2014-03-13 * addon icon has been added back to "puzzle" menu in point screen $ 3.3.1 % Version 3.3.1 _ 2014-03-13 * loading elevation information from database * caches are transfered to Locus via file (more caches but quite slower) $ 3.3.0 % Version 3.3.0 _ 2014-03-12 * display also caches outside radius but with any waypoint inside the radius * abbility to filter caches according to terrain, difficulty and size * added fields with addon version, author and contact * loading PMO tag and number of FP from database * move to final coordinates now only depends on waypoint TYPE (not prefix or name) * updated German and Dutch translation * some bug fixes $ 3.2.3 % Version 3.2.3 _ 2014-02-26 * display user comment for waypoint right behind the owner description * fixed small bug in import $ 3.2.0 % Version 3.2.0 _ 2014-02-23 * loading data optimalization * fix: empty listing crash * checking for database while Live Map is turned on * attachments are now working * some bug fixes $ 3.0.0 % Version 3.0.0 _ 2014-02-19 * development takeover from Radim -Kuratkoo- Vaculik * whole application has been rewote to new Locus API $ END_OF_CHANGE_LOG
